All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable
public class RightStandardSearch
extends AbstractLimitedMoveSearch
Based on MCTS search this search prevent our snake to turn left. So if it just turn right that can't be wrong
Version:
Summer 2021
Author:
carl.lajeunesse
